creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
While logged in as user lenya all menu items of the workflow menu are active 
for the "Create new doctype" document. Whatever menu-item I choose: all menu 
items stay active. This is somewhat surprising.

creator: roku@apache.org
text:
I have renwed the demo install. Works for me now. Maybe caching problems with an
old lenya installl...dunno.

I can reproduce the problem with the demo installation.

Visit
http://olr.kbs.uni-
hannover.de:8080/lenya/default/authoring/tutorial/new_doctype.html
as user "lenya" and open the workflow menu.

(To be precise: I see a German language menu named "Arbeitsfluss")
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text:
When I use the "Site" tab for that strange document the "workflow" 
("Arbeitsfluss") section says:

"This document has no workflow"

What does that mean? All the other documents seem to have a workflow.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text:
Ok, u are right.
I have a patch here. Some files under
lenya/pubs/default/content/workflow/history/authoring/tutorial were missing.

The release manager should decide if this patch should be applied for 1.2.

IMHO +1.
creator: roku@apache.org
egli@apache.org
text:
I don't see a patch attached so it's kind of hard to judge. But I guess it's
just a few workflow files that are missing, so this patch should be quite
harmless and non-intrusive.

So I you have the patch ready roku, I'll give you my blessing :-).
